diagnostics

Source: R/diagnostics.R
diagnostics.Rd

Heating and Cooling Degree diagnostic scripts

diagnostics(
  hdcd = tibble::tibble(),
  hdcd_monthly = tibble::tibble(),
  min_diagnostic_months = 6,
  folder = paste0(getwd()),
  name_append = ""
)

Arguments

hdcd

Default = tibble::tibble()

hdcd_monthly

Default = tibble::tibble()

min_diagnostic_months

Default = 6. Months in the outputs need to exceed this limit to trigger diagnostic plots. Max months is 12.

folder

Default = paste0(getwd()).

name_append

Default = ''. Name to append to all filenames

Contents

Developed by Mengqi Zhao, Zarrar Khan, Kalyn Dorheim, Chris Vernon.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
